formalMetadata.description: A document with a search form that has a text input field and a submit button. When the user enters a search string of less than three characters, the web page displays a warning that blinks for more than three seconds.
formalMetadata.title: Warning that blinks for more than three seconds

purpose.p: This test case is intended to fail because the warning blinks for more than three seconds. Only the time duration of the blinking is tested here, not other usability aspects of the warning or other parts of the page.

functionalOutcome.p: The warning blinks for more than three seconds.

techComment.p: This test case maps to failure F50: Failure of SC 2.2.2 due to a script that causes a blink effect without a mechanism to stop the blinking at 3 seconds or less.
